title: Interpretation of a dream about a bag

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream or a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The bag is one of the things that cannot be overlooked, especially for women, because of its many uses, such as the intense need for travel and transportation. This makes the person who dreams of the bag confused and looking for an explanation for seeing the bag or bag in the dream, whether the man or woman is single, married, divorced, or pregnant. In this article, we will learn about some scholars’ interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream. You may be interested in: Shrimp and eating it in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a bag in a dream is one of the symbols of the future or indicates one of the dreamer’s secrets. In addition To Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream or dream, if the dreamer embraces the bag, it means that this person will get married soon, if he is not single, and if this dream was dreamed by a divorced or widowed woman, then this indicates her imminent marriage, and God knows best. But if If a person dreams of being robbed in a dream, this indicates that he is a person who wastes his time on many trivial matters. Also, seeing a women’s bag in a dream means that you will hear good news in the future or a beautiful surprise. Also, if the dream was to find a bag full of makeup tools and cosmetics This indicates that people lie and deceive others. You may also be interested in: The Snake in a Dream. Interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream for a single woman from Nabulsi. Nabulsi is one of the Islamic scholars who interpreted dreams and was able to gain the trust of many. Al-Nabulsi explains that seeing a bag in a dream for an unmarried girl is a strong indication of the nearness of marriage, and if the bag is blue, this indicates the approaching date of her engagement, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a bag In a dream for a married woman, it indicates the approaching pregnancy or a trip abroad, if the bag she dreamed of was a travel bag in her relationship with her husband. You may be interested: Lentils in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a bag in a dream for a pregnant womanWhen a pregnant woman dreams that she is opening a travel bag and that the bag contains clothes Clean, this means that it is in good health. It also shows that the health of the fetus is good, and if the bag is white, this indicates that. The birth process will be easy, and God knows best. You may also be interested in knowing: The river in a dream The interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen believes that if a person dreams of a large travel bag, this means that he has lost a large number of opportunities in his life. Get it in the next few days. You may be interested: Lentils in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream for someone. Interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream or dream by Ibn Sirin for a single woman. If he is carrying a bag of a beautiful color, this means that he will get married soon, but if it is stolen in the dream, this indicates that he He wastes his time on useless things. Interpretation of seeing yourself carrying a bag in a dream: Seeing yourself carrying a bag in a dream indicates...

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating regular dates for a divorced woman in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the dream is that he eats regular dates for the divorced woman in a dream. In the following lines, we will present the interpretation of the dream that he eats regular dates for the divorced woman in a dream, according to the interpretations of scholars and translators. And they are not personal interpretations..Interpretation of a dream about eating regular dates for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating regular dates for a divorced woman in a dream could be a sign of nourishment, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees a date in a dream, this may indicate goodness, and God has all the knowledge. Where does a woman’s dating go? A divorced woman is one of the subjects worthy of praise, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees a date, it could be a sign of goodness and the nearness of sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating grilled meat for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating grilled meat for a divorced woman in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this except that seeing a divorced woman. Grilling meat in a dream could be a sign of kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees herself in a dream grilling meat, this may be an indication of health, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees grilled meat while cooking, this can be realized, and God knows best. I know the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating raw meat for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating raw meat for a divorced woman in a dream could be a sign of marriage to a good man, and God has all knowledge. If a divorced woman sees herself in a dream eating raw meat, it can be allocated to a man and a husband who supports her, and God has all knowledge. If A divorced woman sees meat that can lead to food, God willing. When a divorced woman sees herself eating cooked meat, it may be a sign of goodness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman eating ice cream in a dream could be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. The UnseenIf a divorced woman sees herself eating ice cream in a dream, this may represent weakness, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees ice cream in a dream, this may be a sign of comfort, and God knows the unseen, as it can express freedom from judgment, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating mangoes for a divorced woman In a dream, the interpretation of a dream about eating mangoes for a divorced woman in a dream could be a reference to lawful money, and God knows the unseen. Eating ripe mangoes out of season can also indicate goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a mango that a divorced woman has picked, perhaps it represents a profit, God willing. Wherever it appears, what is the goodness and sustenance that You get it, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating pasta for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating pasta for a divorced woman in a dream can lead to goodness, and God has all knowledge. Where if a divorced woman sees pasta in a dream, it can be a sign of marriage, and God knows the unseen. When she sees pasta for a divorced woman in A dream can be a sign of goodness and living with God’s permission. Seeing pasta for a divorced woman can also express a beautiful appreciation from God

title: Interpretation of a dream about fishing with a hook for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fishing with a hook in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is fishing with a hook. This dream indicates that this girl can get rid of all the sorrows and worries that she is exposed to and will get rid of in the coming period. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is fishing with a hook and cleans it well. It indicates This vision indicates that this girl wants to fulfill many of the desires and ambitions that she wants to achieve. While if an unmarried girl dreams that she is fishing with a large hook, then this fish is also fat and abundant. This dream indicates that she will soon be engaged to a good husband and live a life full of joy and happiness. But if a girl dreams that she is catching a fish with a hook, then that fish is also dead. This dream indicates that this girl is living in a very difficult time, bad financial circumstances, fears and heartaches. But he can get rid of all sorrows in the coming period. See also: Fish In a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of watching fishing with a hook in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is fishing with a hook. This vision indicates that she will live a happy and stable life with her husband and that love and joy will prevail between them. Also, if a married woman sees in her dream that she is catching a large fish with a hook. This vision indicates that a lot of money and food will come and she will perform all her duties perfectly. If a married woman dreams that she is fishing with a rod. This dream indicates that she is experiencing sorrows, anxiety, and a bad psychological state. But she can get rid of all worries and bad circumstances in the coming days. Whereas if a married woman sees in her dream that she is cleaning the fish she caught with a hook, then she is cooking it. This dream indicates that this woman lives a beautiful and happy life with her family, raises her children well, and takes care of her husband. If a married woman dreams that she is fishing with a hook. This dream indicates This married woman will be happy with the news of her pregnancy in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing fishing with a hook in a dream for a man and its meaning. If one sees in his dream that he is catching a fish with a hook. This dream indicates that he will obtain a job and a prominent position at work and the job will remain stable for a long time. Also, if A person saw in his dream that he is fishing with a hook. This vision shows that he is going through a difficult situation and problems, but all the problems will end and his life will be renewed and properly arranged. When a man dreams that he is eating fish that are caught with a hook, this dream indicates that he is successful in his work, persistent, and loves to work. He will excel and continue in it until the end. Whereas if a person sees in his dream that he is catching a large fish with his hook and cleaning it, this fish also has a strange shape and the person does not know it. This vision indicates that he will have a lot of money and he will fulfill a wish he had fulfilled in the coming days. Read Also: Seeing raw fish in a dream for divorced, married and single women. The meaning of seeing fish in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is catching a hook and eating it. This dream indicates that

title: Interpretation of seeing Eid sacrifices in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Eid sacrifices in a dream via Vision roy2a.com Eid sacrifices are camels, cows, and sheep that are slaughtered to draw near to God Almighty during the days of the blessed Eid Al-Adha. The Eid sacrifice in a dream is a vision that has many connotations. Seeing Eid sacrifices in a dream depends on the condition and circumstances of the person who sees them, and whether he is single, a married woman, or a pregnant woman. Today, through the Ruya website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing the Eid sacrifice in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, follow us. What is the interpretation of the Eid sacrifice in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing the sacrificial ram in a dream indicates what is distinguished With a vision of personal strength, boldness, and legs. Seeing a sacrificial lamb without horns in a dream indicates the unstable and weak character of the pioneer. Seeing sacrifice in a dream refers to solving problems, dissolving sorrows, and releasing worries. Seeing sacrifice in a dream indicates the imminent recovery of the sick person, and God knows best. Seeing the skin of a ram in a dream is It refers to the disputes and disputes that exist between the fortuneteller and his family. See also: Interpretation of seeing Eid takbeers in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Eid sacrifices in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: Seeing Eid sacrifices in a dream indicates getting rid of any fatigue or any anxiety that the viewer feels. Seeing Eid sacrifices in a prisoner’s dream is a sign. Until he is released soon, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing an Eid sacrifice in a dream for a man: Seeing a man as an Eid sacrifice in a dream indicates what God grants to the moneymaker, kindness, ease in his affairs, and settling his debts. Seeing a man as an Eid sacrifice in a dream indicates victory over enemies and security. From fear. Seeing a man distributing the sacrifice in a dream indicates the prestigious status and great position he will obtain among the people. Seeing in a dream an unmarried man slaughtering and dividing the sacrifice announces that he will marry a girl of beauty and good morals. Seeing a married man in a dream slaughtering and dividing the sacrifice indicates a happy married life. And stable. Seeing a man losing a sacrifice in a dream is addressing his shortcomings in religion, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing Eid cakes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Eid sacrifices in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman as an Eid sacrifice in a dream. This indicates that she will be associated with a good man with good morals. And she will be happy with him. Seeing an unmarried woman slaughtering a sacrifice in a dream indicates a crisis from which she will be freed and good news that will arrive soon. Seeing an unmarried woman with the blood of a sacrifice in a dream indicates the kindness of her heart, the purity of her soul, and the peace of her soul. What is the interpretation of seeing Eid sacrifices in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman As a sacrifice in a dream symbolizes her husband. Seeing a married woman in a dream as a white sacrifice indicates the good and pure soul of her husband. Seeing a married woman as a black sacrifice in a dream may indicate that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman buying a black ram in a dream indicates the blessing and goodness that will prevail in her home in The coming period. Seeing a married woman in a dream as a fat sacrifice indicates

title: Interpretation of a scorpion sting in a dream - to see a scorpion in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a scorpion for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a fiancée, a married man or a single young man, whether he killed a yellow lion, stung me, killed a scorpion and Ibn Sirin murmured. Interpretation of a scorpion sting in a dream. Seeing a scorpion indicates a corrupt man gossiping in his wake to spread discord and discord among family members. This strife may lead to fighting and killing each other, and another saying by Imam Ibn Sirin explaining that the vision. A scorpion in a dream can indicate an enemy and competitor or a reference to money and possessions. Interpretation of a scorpion in a dream Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned that seeing a scorpion in a dream can sometimes indicate money and wealth. Perhaps his vision here indicates the money and wealth he acquires in life. True, but this money will not last in his possession, and God knows best. It has been said in another interpretation of seeing a scorpion sting in a dream that the sting of a scorpion that it uses to sting in the dream is a reference to the language of one of the people known for corrupting their morals and controlling people with their language. Seeing a scorpion may mean that someone has slandered him while he was awake or absent, or it may be causing unrest and suspicion around him. Interpretation of a scorpion sting in a dream Other interpreters said that whoever sees in his dream that he was stung by a scorpion, then this dream expresses the presence of some disagreements and problems with corrupt people in reality. It is said that one who is stung or stung by a scorpion. In a dream it could be an indication of solutions to harm a demonstrator's opinion in life. Realism or being an enemy and adversary causes some harm to the viewer while awake, and in the same context, it showed that seeing a scorpion sting is a sign of worry and worry caused by one of the people surrounding the viewer in real life or being an enemy that leaves the viewer confused. Which in a dream indicates Intimidation and slander are slander. Scorpio is a slander among people. A scorpion sting is a virtue that falls upon a person. If a scorpion stings him, the enemy will stay away from him or hate him. Burning scorpions in his house means the death of his enemies. If he eats a cooked or roasted scorpion, then he will receive money from the gossiping enemy as a permissible inheritance, but if it is raw it is forbidden. If he sees a scorpion on his shirt or in his place, then it is an enemy and he is in the position of living and earning, and if he sees it on his bed, then it is an enemy while he is among his family. And whoever sees a scorpion in his stomach, then his enemies are among his workers. And if you come out from within him, then they are his enemies among his grandchildren or the hostility that takes place between them. Anyone who eats a raw scorpion will follow an immoral person. Scorpio shows a man who does not know his friend from his enemy. Scorpio is weak, the enemy of endurance and stubbornness. Whoever sees that he has killed a scorpion, he will be victorious over his enemy. Whoever dreams that he has a scorpion in his hand that stings people, then he is the one who supports people and harasses each other. Whoever sees a resemblance to a scorpion and not a scorpion, then he is a man who thinks that he is his enemy, but not his enemy. The sting of a scorpion is the tongue of gossip. Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion sting for a single woman. A scorpion sting in one’s dream is a disappointment. This vision may indicate the dreamer’s only failure in real life. A scorpion sting is a symbol of a cunning person who can enter a person’s real life to laugh at him. This vision foretells that the

If he eats a cooked or roasted scorpion, then he will receive money from the gossiping enemy as a permissible inheritance, but if it is raw it is forbidden. If he sees a scorpion on his shirt or in his place, then it is an enemy and he is in the position of living and earning, and if he sees it on his bed, then it is an enemy while he is among his family. And whoever sees a scorpion in his stomach, then his enemies are among his workers. And if you come out from within him, then they are his enemies among his grandchildren or the hostility that takes place between them. Anyone who eats a raw scorpion will follow an immoral person. Scorpio shows a man who does not know his friend from his enemy. Scorpio is weak, the enemy of endurance and stubbornness. Whoever sees that he has killed a scorpion, he will be victorious over his enemy. Whoever dreams that he has a scorpion in his hand that stings people, then he is the one who supports people and harasses each other. Whoever sees a resemblance to a scorpion and not a scorpion, then he is a man who thinks that he is his enemy, but not his enemy. The sting of a scorpion is the tongue of gossip. Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion sting for a single woman. A scorpion sting in one’s dream is a disappointment. This vision may indicate the dreamer’s only failure in real life. title: Interpretation of milk derivatives in a dream: Milk and cheese in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of hot, cold, spoiled, and cooked sour milk for unmarried women. Giving a drink of yogurt milk to a married woman. Seeing spilled milk for a pregnant woman, butter, and cream. Milk derivatives in a dream are considered beautiful and wonderful dreams that give us a lot of joy and happiness when we see them in a dream, as they can be seen in many forms, including drinking. Milk in a dream or refusal to eat. Milk in a dream, or buying milk, and other meanings and dreams that we have a lot of important meanings and associations that come upon a person and that we must pay close attention to.. As Ibn Sirin, the interpreter of dreams, explained to us the meaning of seeing milk derivatives in a dream for all people, Which has many important meanings for people to be alerted to. The symbol of milk and its derivatives in a dream. The presence of milk derivatives in a dream is often a good omen for the opinion of improving one’s standard of living. Buttermilk in a dream may indicate sustenance that comes after fatigue and may be on a trip. Curd curds in a dream can indicate Also to livelihood preceded by worries and fatigue, and it was said that money is forbidden. Yogurt in a dream or yoghurt in a dream is a sign of good luck and eating it makes things easier, benefit and prosperity. As for butter or ghee in a dream, it means collecting money or goods that come to mind, either to improve one’s condition or facilitate one’s affairs. Cheese in a dream is money. In comfort and bliss, the softer the cheese, the more stable and comfortable it is. Cheese in a dream can indicate money. In general, seeing all dairy products in a dream is a good omen, and a positive sign of improving circumstances, especially if they are in good condition. Seeing rotten is a sign of stumbling or something that hinders the completion of the dreamer’s intention for goals. Given that you are diverting milk Or yogurt into curds, butter, or cheese, this indicates the work that you do in life, and the goal is to change the product for the better and better. As for buying a dairy product in a dream, it means an increase in livelihood. Selling a dairy product in a dream or offering it to people indicates The good deeds and efforts you make for the sake of others. Eating dairy products in a dream indicates facilitation of your worldly affairs. As for pouring milk and its derivatives in a dream, it can indicate loss of money or misplaced extravagance. Interpretation of milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing an unmarried woman drinking milk in a dream Evidence that she will hear very happy news soon. Seeing an unmarried woman bathing in milk in a dream is evidence that she is kind and has good morals. Seeing a girl distributing milk to her sisters in a dream is evidence that she will be exposed to many problems. Seeing a girl drinking milk in a strange country is evidence However, she will find someone who sympathizes with her. Seeing a girl’s milk in an unusual shape in a dream is evidence that someone has a grudge against her. Seeing a married woman drinking milk in a dream is evidence that her reputation is very good. Seeing a married woman drinking milk in a dream is evidence of an abundance of reputation.

title: Interpretation of a white dog in a dream

preview.html: The dog is considered a pet that shows loyalty. The interpretation of a white dog in a dream has many different meanings. Seeing dogs in a dream is a common thing for many, and many want to know the interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream. Other times, they point to some bad connotations whose meanings vary from one person to another depending on their psychological, health, and social status. In the following encyclopedia article, we present some different interpretations of seeing a white dog in a dream. Interpretation of a white dog in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a single girl in her dream of a white dog growing In her house and that this dog is eating in her house, this vision is an indication that there are many evil people in this girl’s life and these people enter her house and eat in it. But Almighty God will save her from their evil. A single girl saw in her dream from Mona at a great distance like a dog that was very brutal and she felt very afraid for the dog. The dream shows the presence of evil approaching her, but God saves her from this evil and saves her from this. Interpretation of a white dog in a dream for a married woman. For a married woman to see in her dream that her husband gives her a white dog as a gift, in this dream it appears that there is a person who comes to sit with this woman and there is hatred, deceit, and intense malice in her, but here it is from this evil. Seeing a married woman in a dream is that she She bought a white dog but lost the dog and did not find it in this dream, meaning that something bad was going to happen to this woman, but God saved her from this matter. Interpretation of a white dog in a dream for a divorced womanIf a divorced woman sees in her dream that her ex-husband gave her a white dog, then this dream is a sign On the problems and differences that exist between them, but these problems will soon disappear.An absolute vision of buying a white dog that is lost and cannot be found. This dream shows that she was going to face many problems, but God saved her from those problems. Interpretation of a white dog in a dream for a man: If a man sees a white dog in pajamas and the dog is playing with him, then this dream indicates many problems in this person’s life, but he will overcome them by God’s command. Seeing a man in the pajamas of a woman he knows and giving him a white dog, in this dream, is an indication that this man will be affected by something bad, and many of these problems are behind this woman, so he must care about her a lot and avoid her and stay away from her. Seeing a dog attacking in a dream and running away from it. Seeing a person A white dog wearing pajamas is coming from behind and wants to bite him and hurt him, but he runs away before he gets hurt. In this vision, this dream illustrates the large and many problems that exist in the dreamer’s life, but she succeeded in escaping them. Seeing a woman in a dream with a scary white dog that wanted to harm her and catch her is evidence that there are many problems in this woman’s life that she cannot escape from, but May God save her from this matter. If a woman saw in a dream that a white dog was coming from behind her and was trying to get her, but she was able to escape from it, this means that this woman was able to survive

title: Interpretation of seeing something coming out of the eye in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing something coming out of the eye in a dream via the roy2a.com website: Seeing something coming out of the eye shows problems and fears, and the affected eye shows sins and disobedience, and the affected eye shows the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life who harm him and cause him harm. A divorced wife of some imams such as Imam Ibn Shirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other modern-day translators, so please follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing something coming out of the eye in a dream of Imam Ibn Sirin? Whoever sees tears falling from his eyes and feels cold, it indicates goodness and comfort. From distress and loss of anxiety, and hot tears indicate anxiety and pain. Seeing blood falling from the eye in a dream indicates problems and fears and that this person will bear many burdens and problems. If he sees that his eye is injured, it indicates his sins and sins and his distance from God. Seeing an injury in the eye In a dream, it indicates the presence of enemies in the life of the fortuneteller who consults him. See also: Interpretation of seeing tired eyes in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing something coming out of the eye in a dream for a single woman? Seeing tears in the eyes in a single woman’s dream indicates the end of worry and anxiety and overcoming difficult stages. If she sees The girl said that her eye was affected by conjunctivitis, which indicates that he committed a sin and did not repent for it, and he must repent and return to God. If the girl sees that her eye hurts, this shows the person who is causing her pain and trouble. What is the interpretation of seeing something coming out of the eye in a dream for a married woman? Seeing something bad coming out of the eye in a married woman’s dream indicates problems and fears that she is exposed to. If a married woman sees tears in her eyes in her dream, this indicates alleviating distress, paying off debts, and improving her living conditions. If a married woman sees her beautiful eyes, this indicates her happiness with her husband. And the stability of her married life. See also: Interpretation of seeing eye color change in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing something coming out of the eye in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees cold tears falling from her eyes in a dream, this indicates the approaching date of childbirth and the ease of childbirth. Seeing blood and pus coming out From the eyes of a pregnant woman in a dream: This indicates the problems and pain that occurred during childbirth. What is the interpretation of seeing something coming out of the eye in a dream for a divorced woman? If a divorced woman sees hot tears falling from her eyes in her dream, this indicates the test that she will face. If a divorced woman sees tears on her cheek and does not cry in A dream, and this indicates the presence of enemies in her life who cause her harm and harm. Seeing an injured eye in an absolute dream indicates that he is going through judgment and trial or that he is far from obedience to God. See also: Interpretation of seeing an eye injury in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about pus coming out of the eye? Seeing an exit Pus in a dream indicates the death of worry and anxiety if the shame does not harm. Seeing pus and blood in the eye in a dream indicates harm and damage to the viewer. What is the interpretation of a dream of a broken eye? Seeing cracks in the eyes in a dream indicates a difficult task that will be undertaken by the monarch and a large number of Burdens.t

What is the interpretation of seeing something coming out of the eye in a dream for a single woman? Seeing tears in the eyes in a single woman’s dream indicates the end of worry and anxiety and overcoming difficult stages. Seeing something bad coming out of the eye in a married woman’s dream indicates problems and fears that she is exposed to. If a married woman sees tears in her eyes in her dream, this indicates alleviating distress, paying off debts, and improving her living conditions. What is the interpretation of seeing something coming out of the eye in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees cold tears falling from her eyes in a dream, this indicates the approaching date of childbirth and the ease of childbirth. Seeing blood and pus coming out From the eyes of a pregnant woman in a dream: This indicates the problems and pain that occurred during childbirth.
